admission_text:
Become a Member of the RAL Art Center

As a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization, the RAL Art Center depends on your membership to be able to fund educational programs and scholarships for adults and youth as well as general operating expenses. 

A yearly membership provides you with: discounts on all classes/workshops/lectures, electronic receipt of Artline & Artmail, opportunities to show your work in All-Member Exhibits and to apply as a Co-operative artist. 

We very much appreciate your vital support.

​

​

​

Annual Membership Levels and Fees:

​

Ambassador / $1,000

20% Off Wall Rent if Co-op Artist

20% Discount in Gift Shop

20% Discount on Facility Rental

Exclusive 2-Day-Early Preview of Key Fine Art Shows

1 Free Art Heist Ticket

1 Free Family/Friends Paint Night (limit 10 participants)

Envoy / $500

15% Off Wall Rent if Co-op Artist

15% Discount in Gift Shop

15% Discount on Facility Rental

Exclusive 1-Day-Early Preview of Key Fine Art Shows

1 Art Heist Ticket 50% off

1 Free Paint Night for 2 Participants

​

Patron / $250

10% Off Wall Rent if Co-op Artist

10% Discount in Gift Shop

10% Discount on Facility Rental

1 Free Paint Night for 1 Participant

Partner / $120

5% Discount in Gift Shop

5% Discount on Facility Rental

Friend / $50

  * Call the Art Center at [804-436-9309](tel:1-804-436-9309)

  * or Visit us at 19 N. Main Street Kilmarnock, VA 22482

  * or Fill out the Membership [application](https://www.ralartcenter.com/membership-application)
